meta.article_title: October 29, 2013 - Start Drills with a Serve

terminologie_extrait.definition: type of spin on a serve or push
terminologie_extrait.contexte: used in drills to practice looping off the backspin

debutant.description: Serve backspin; receiver pushes back long to a pre-set spot; server loops off the backspin to the same spot.

intermediaire.description: Server serves backspin; receiver pushes back long to a pre-set spot; server loops off the backspin to a pre-set spot, and then continues looping off the block.

exercices_complementaires.description: After the opening loop against backspin, follow with hitting instead of looping.
Loop or hit the forehand over and over, except the receiver's goal is to block him out of position and force him to chop with his backhand.

erreurs_a_eviter: Randomly blocking to different parts of the table
Not focusing on developing specific techniques
